issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-172
issue.discussion: The order specifications are incomplete because the non-_explicit functions do not have such parameters.
issue.resolution: Add a new sentence: "If the program does not specify an order, it shall be memory_order_seq_cst." Or perhaps: "The non-_explicit non-member functions shall affect memory as though they were _explicit with memory_order_seq_cst."
